name: x-accuracy-2
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s accuracy by two stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises accuracy by two stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.sword-shield: It sharply raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
